title: Criticism of Psychiatry and  Psychoanalysis - Collection 3
description:
Criticism of Psychiatry and  Psychoanalysis - Collection 3:

We have 27 titles in this upload:

-  Bloomgarden & Mennuti (Eds.) - Psychotherapist Revealed; Therapists Speak About Self-Disclosure in Psychotherapy (2009)

-  Carlat - Unhinged; the Trouble with Psychiatry; a Doctor's Revelation About a Profession in Crisis (2010)

-  Dwoskin (Ed.) - Emerging Targets & Therapeutics in the Treatment of Psychostimulant Abuse (2014)

-  Edmundson - The Death of Sigmund Freud; Fascism, Psychoanalysis and the Rise of Fundamentalism (2007)

-  Feltham (Ed.) - Controversies in Psychotherapy and Counselling (1999)

-  Fromme - Systems of Psychotherapy; Dialectical Tensions and Integration (2011)

-  Gross - Themes, Issues and Debates in Psychology, 3e (2009)

-  Handelman - Thought Manipulation; the Use and Abuse of Psychological Trickery (2009)

-  Heller - Freud, A to Z (2005)

-  Kallert et al (Eds.) - Coercive Treatment in Psychiatry; Clinical, Legal and Ethical Aspects (2011)

-  Kanner & Schachter (Eds.) - Psychiatric Controversies in Epilepsy (2008)

-  Katz (Ed.) - Metaphor and Fields; Common Ground, Common Language, and the Future of Psychoanalysis (2013)

-  Kelly et al - Irreducible Mind; Toward a Psychology for the 21st Century (2007)

-  Kirsch - The Emperor's New Drugs; Exploding the Antidepressant Myth (2010)

-  Krapp (Ed.) - Psychologists & Their Theories, for Students (2005)

-  Lennon & Stainton (Eds.) - The Achilles of Rationalist Psychology (2008)

-  Lilienfeld et al (Eds.) - Science and Pseudoscience in Clinical Psychology (2012)

-  Maddux & Winstead (Eds.) - Psychopathology Foundations for a Contemporary Understanding (2005)

-  Marcus - Being for the Other; Emanuel Levinas, Ethical Living and Psychoanalysis (2008)

-  McHugh - Try to Remember; Psychiatry's Clash Over Meaning, Memory and Mind (2008)

-  Miller - Drugged; the Science and Culture Behind Psychotropic Drugs (2014)

-  Morrall - The Trouble with Therapy; Sociology and Psychotherapy (2008)

-  Paris - Prescriptions for the Mind; a Critical View of Contemporary Psychiatry (2008)

-  Rudnytsky - Rescuing Psychoanalysis from Freud, and Other Essays in Re-Vision (2011)

-  Sabshin - Changing American Psychiatry; a Personal Perspective (2008)

-  Torrey - American Psychosis; How the Federal Government Destroyed the Mental Illness Treatment System (2014)

-  Welldon - Playing with Dynamite; a Personal Approach to the Psychoanalytic Understanding of Perversions.. (2011)
